introduction_text:
Tradeline Feedback Form

Help us understand your tradeline needs better by answering a few quick questions. This information will help our team provide you with personalized recommendations.

Your credit score affects many key areas of life today—from determining if you qualify for a loan or credit card to influencing the interest rates you pay. It can also impact the cost of insurance premiums for your home or car, and much more.

All information is kept confidential and secure.
name: tradeline-feedback
success_message:
Thank you for your feedback!

We have received your submission and our team will review it shortly. Based on your responses, we'll be in touch with personalized tradeline recommendations that match your needs and timeline.

If you have any immediate questions, feel free to contact us at support@rockettradeline.com
title: Tradeline Feedback Form

web_form_fields.label: Why are you looking to buy a tradeline?
web_form_fields.options:
I want to buy a home or property
I want to refinance a mortgage
I want to buy a car
I want to apply for a personal or business loan
Other reasons (e.g. rent a house)

web_form_fields.label: What are your main reasons for purchasing a tradeline?
web_form_fields.options:
To access lower interest rates
To access higher credit limits
To boost your credit score
Qualify to buy a house
Qualify to buy a Car

web_form_fields.label: What is your current credit score?
web_form_fields.options:
Bad credit: 300 to 579
Fair credit: 630 to 689
Good credit: 690 to 719
Excellent credit: 720 to 850

web_form_fields.label: Do you have any of the following derogatory marks?
web_form_fields.options:
​​Late payments that are around 30 days or more past due
Charge-offs
Foreclosures
Bankruptcy filings
Repossessions

web_form_fields.label: The Best Way to Reach You
